entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 06:53 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
